snippet: A man suspected in four deaths in three shootings has been found dead of a self-inflicted gunshot wound, the state police said Monday.
abstract: Police in West Virginia say Jody Lee Hunt, man suspected of fatally shooting four people in separate three incidents, was found dead of self-inflicted gunshot wound.
lead_paragraph: A man suspected in four deaths in three shootings has been found dead of a self-inflicted gunshot wound, the state police said Monday.

headline.main: West Virginia: Suspect in Four Killings Is Found Dead
headline.print_headline: West Virginia: Suspect in Four Killings Is Found Dead
